Public MustInherit Class CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty Implements IMessageProperty

summary.span: 提供一个抽象基类以便将相关键计算延迟到所有相关数据可用后执行。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for deferring correlation key calculation until all of the correlation data is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它通常用于使其他通道能够在网络上发送消息之前提供相关数据。This is typically used to allow other channels to provide correlation data before a message is sent on the wire.

summary.span: 由派生类的构造函数调用以初始化对象。

span.span: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.

span.span: Adds required correlation data to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在添加所需的相关数据后，会将此数据从 列表中删除。When required correlation data is added, it is removed from the list. 当所有必需的数据现已添加，列表为空和返回`true`。When all required data has been added, the list is empty and returns `true`.

summary.span: 在所有相关信息可用时由相关协议调用以异步构造相关性。

span.span: Called by a correlation protocol when all of the correlation information is available to asynchronously construct the correlation.

returns.span: 对当前异步操作的引用。

span.span: A reference to the current asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 来构造相关性。This method calls to construct the correlation. 应用程序必须提供对 的实现，这将异步执行对指定消息的相关性计算。Applications must provide an implementation of , which asynchronously performs the correlation calculation of the specified message. 若要在完成异步操作时得到通知，请从 方法调用 `callback`。To be notified when the asynchronous operation is complete, call from the `callback` method. 如果在完成异步操作前调用 ，则此操作将会被阻止，直至异步操作完成。If is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes. 如果操作未在指定的超时间隔内完成，则将引发 。If the operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a is thrown. 此方法是使用 异步设计模式的 的异步版本。This method is an asynchronous version of using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

span.span: Returns the message that was prepared asynchronously for correlation.

returns.span: 为获得相关性而准备的消息。

span.span: The message that was prepared for correlation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 来检索消息。This method calls to retrieve the message. 应用程序必须提供对 的实现，这将返回为获得相关性而准备的消息。Applications must provide an implementation of , which returns the message that was prepared for correlation. 如果在完成异步操作前调用 ，则此操作将会被阻止，直至异步操作完成。If is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes. 如果操作未在对 的调用中所指定的超时间隔内完成，则调用此方法时将引发 。If the operation did not complete within the time-out interval specified in the call to a is thrown when this method is called. 此方法将完成使用 异步设计模式的 的异步版本。This method completes the asynchronous version of using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).
